name: Ch17BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Look at this, Lady Lute!|The sea teems with ships today!
speak;Lute;Indeed. And they're all maintaining a significant distance from the eastern waters.|That's consistent with my notes on <red>Lizardzerker</> territorial patterns.
speak;Dozla;Oh?|You know of the <red>Lizardzerkers</>, Lady Lute?

speak;Lute;Of course. I've compiled a preliminary thesis on reptilian humanoid anomalies.|My research indicates they're berserkers who've undergone partial lizard metamorphosis.|However, my notes lack firsthand observational data.
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Well, you're in luck!|I've fought those scaly brutes myself!
speak;Lute;You have?|This is excellent!|My research has been limited to accounts from sailors and fragmentary texts.|You must tell me everything.
speak;Dozla;Fierce warriors, they are!|One nearly split my favorite axe with a single parry!|Strength that would make even General Duessel envious!
speak;Lute;Fascinating.|My texts suggest enhanced musculature but not to that degree.|Would you estimate their strength at 2.7 or 3.2 times that of a standard berserker?
speak;Dozla;Err... I'd say they're... very strong?|Gwah ha ha!|Numbers aren't my specialty, Lady Lute!

speak;Lute;My research is inconclusive regarding their transformation process.|The Bael Manuscript suggests dietary causation, while Elder Sages theorize a magical affliction.|What insights can you offer?
speak;Dozla;The old sea dogs claim it comes from eating weird magical fish guts and seaweed!|Others say they made blood pacts with sea serpents!|I'm not sure which is true!
speak;Lute;I suspected as much.|This confirms my hypothesis that multiple pathways to lizardification exist.|I must update my research immediately.
speak;Dozla;You truly are the superior mind Lady L'Arachel claims!|Tell me, what's the best way to defeat these creatures?|My standard axe barely scratched their scales!

speak;Lute;Based on my taxonomic classification, they would be vulnerable to thermal disruption.|My thesis suggests an ice-enchanted weapon would be optimal.|The cold would inhibit their movement while bypassing scale protection.
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|An ice axe!|Brilliant, Lady Lute!|That's why you're the prodigy!
speak;Lute;The theory is sound, but untested.|I'd be most interested in documenting the results of such an encounter.|For academic purposes, of course.
speak;Dozla;Well then, I'll head to the armory and commission an ice axe right away!|Lady L'Arachel would be most pleased if I brought her a <red>Lizardzerker</> scale as a trophy!
speak;Lute;Wait, I should accompany you to record the precise enchantment parameters...|I need to specify the optimal freezing coefficient...
speak;Lute;And he's gone.|Unfortunate.|I suppose I'll have to update my notes with estimated values.|Perhaps I can collect tissue samples once he returns.
speak;Lute;This will make an excellent addition to my monograph on maritime monstrosities.|I wonder if the transformation affects their cognitive functions...|So many variables to explore.
